Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-3474 affecting package bazel for versions less than 5.3.2-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-3474 affecting package bazel for versions less than 5.3.2-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package bazel is earlier than 5.3.2-1, affected by CVE-2022-3474
